name: oldTail
description:
♦Nine maps! Nine shiny herbs! Nine ways!
Collect clues and trace it
-BK-♦Seeking pleasure
oldTail is a treasure hunt
-Aoe-♦MainWith big eyes, short legs, and big fists,
The young man's name is 'InJeong'

In this journey,
Those who disturb me, i crash it!

Where is it?
Shining herbs are hidden,
Collect information and look for clues♦Features▪ This is a story about the young man's journey,
Explore the map and find a shiny herb
Nine maps! Nine shiny herbs! Nine ways!
The movement between maps is free!

▪ I am tough guy! Let's do the punching, throwing the stone and defeating the enemy
Dialogue with npc and monsters, collect clues
Sometimes you may need gifts item for them

▪ Collect the money and items
Collect the bead of life
Level up health, stamina, power, and get stronger!

▪ During the journey, find a 'book for travelers' and learn the skills,
You can use techniques such as hooks, uppers, blocking, throwing bead, and virgin ghost dolls...



▪ Can you collect all shiny herbs?
it's not an easy journey! but... Don't give up!
